verses.verse: I <WG1473> am <WG1510> the <WG3588> true <WG228> vine, <WG288> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> is <WG2076> the <WG3588> husbandman. <WG1092>

Every <WG3956> branch <WG2814> in <WG1722> me <WG1698> that beareth <WG5342> not <WG3361> fruit <WG2590> he taketh away: <WG142> <WG846> and <WG2532> every <WG3956> branch that beareth <WG5342> fruit, <WG2590> he purgeth <WG2508> it, <WG846> that <WG2443> it may bring forth <WG5342> more <WG4119> fruit. <WG2590>
Now <WG2235> ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> clean <WG2513> through <WG1223> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> which <WG3739> I have spoken <WG2980> unto you. <WG5213>

Abide <WG3306> in <WG1722> me, <WG1698> and I <WG2504> in <WG1722> you. <WG5213> As <WG2531> the <WG3588> branch <WG2814> cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> bear <WG5342> fruit <WG2590> of <WG575> itself, <WG1438> except <WG3362> it abide <WG3306> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> vine; <WG288> no <WG3761> more <WG3779> can ye, <WG5210> except <WG3362> ye abide <WG3306> in <WG1722> me. <WG1698>

I <WG1473> am <WG1510> the <WG3588> vine, <WG288> ye <WG5210> are the <WG3588> branches: <WG2814> He that abideth <WG3306> in <WG1722> me, <WG1698> and I <WG2504> in <WG1722> him, <WG846> the same <WG3778> bringeth forth <WG5342> much <WG4183> fruit: <WG2590> for <WG3754> without <WG5565> me <WG1700> ye can <WG1410> <WG3756> do <WG4160> nothing. <WG3762>

If a man abide not <WG3362> <WG5100> <WG3306> in <WG1722> me, <WG1698> he is cast <WG906> forth <WG1854> as <WG5613> a branch, <WG2814> and <WG2532> is withered; <WG3583> and <WG2532> men gather <WG4863> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> cast <WG906> them into <WG1519> the fire, <WG4442> and <WG2532> they are burned. <WG2545>

If <WG1437> ye abide <WG3306> in <WG1722> me, <WG1698> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> words <WG4487> abide <WG3306> in <WG1722> you, <WG5213> ye shall ask <WG154> what <WG3739> <WG1437> ye will, <WG2309> and <WG2532> it shall be done <WG1096> unto you. <WG5213>

Herein <WG1722> <WG5129> is my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> glorified, <WG1392> that <WG2443> ye bear <WG5342> much <WG4183> fruit; <WG2590> so <WG2532> shall ye be <WG1096> my <WG1698> disciples. <WG3101>
As <WG2531> the <WG3588> Father hath <WG3962> loved <WG25> me, <WG3165> so have I loved <WG2504> <WG25> you: <WG5209> continue <WG3306> ye in <WG1722> my <WG1699> love. <WG26>

If <WG1437> ye keep <WG5083> my <WG3450> commandments, <WG1785> ye shall abide <WG3306> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> love; <WG26> even as <WG2531> I <WG1473> have kept <WG5083> my <WG3450> Father's <WG3962> commandments, <WG1785> and <WG2532> abide <WG3306> in <WG1722> his <WG846> love. <WG26>

These things <WG5023> have I spoken <WG2980> unto you, <WG5213> that <WG2443> my <WG1699> joy <WG5479> might remain <WG3306> in <WG1722> you, <WG5213> and <WG2532> that your <WG5216> joy <WG5479> might be full. <WG4137>
This <WG3778> is <WG2076> my <WG1699> commandment, <WG1785> That <WG2443> ye love <WG25> one another, <WG240> as <WG2531> I have loved <WG25> you. <WG5209>
Greater <WG3187> love <WG26> hath <WG2192> no man <WG3762> than this, <WG5026> that <WG2443> a man <WG5100> lay down <WG5087> his <WG848> life <WG5590> for <WG5228> his <WG848> friends. <WG5384>
Ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> my <WG3450> friends, <WG5384> if <WG1437> ye do <WG4160> whatsoever <WG3745> I <WG1473> command <WG1781> you. <WG5213>

Henceforth I call you not <WG3765> <WG3004> <WG5209> servants; <WG1401> for <WG3754> the <WG3588> servant <WG1401> knoweth <WG1492> not <WG3756> what <WG5101> his <WG846> lord <WG2962> doeth: <WG4160> but <WG1161> I have called <WG2046> you <WG5209> friends; <WG5384> for <WG3754> all things <WG3956> that <WG3739> I have heard <WG191> of <WG3844> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> I have made known <WG1107> unto you. <WG5213>

Ye <WG5210> have not <WG3756> chosen <WG1586> me, <WG3165> but <WG235> I <WG1473> have chosen <WG1586> you, <WG5209> and <WG2532> ordained <WG5087> you, <WG5209> that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> should go <WG5217> and <WG2532> bring forth <WG5342> fruit, <WG2590> and <WG2532> that your <WG5216> fruit <WG2590> should remain: <WG3306> that <WG2443> whatsoever <WG3748> <WG302> ye shall ask <WG154> of the <WG3588> Father <WG3962> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> name, <WG3686> he may give <WG1325> it you. <WG5213>

If <WG1487> the <WG3588> world <WG2889> hate <WG3404> you, <WG5209> ye know <WG1097> that <WG3754> it hated <WG3404> me <WG1691> before <WG4412> it hated you. <WG5216>

If <WG1487> ye were <WG2258> of <WG1537> the <WG3588> world, <WG2889> the <WG3588> world <WG2889> would love <WG5368> <WG302> his own: <WG2398> but <WG1161> because <WG3754> ye are <WG2075> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> the <WG3588> world, <WG2889> but <WG235> I <WG1473> have chosen <WG1586> you <WG5209> out of <WG1537> the <WG3588> world, <WG2889> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> the <WG3588> world <WG2889> hateth <WG3404> you. <WG5209>

Remember <WG3421> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> said <WG2036> unto you, <WG5213> The servant <WG1401> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> greater <WG3187> than his <WG848> lord. <WG2962> If <WG1487> they have persecuted <WG1377> me, <WG1691> they will also <WG2532> persecute <WG1377> you; <WG5209> if <WG1487> they have kept <WG5083> my <WG3450> saying, <WG3056> they will keep <WG5083> yours <WG5212> also. <WG2532>

But <WG235> all <WG3956> these things <WG5023> will they do <WG4160> unto you <WG5213> for my name's sake, <WG1223> <WG3450> <WG3686> because <WG3754> they know <WG1492> not <WG3756> him that sent <WG3992> me. <WG3165>

If <WG1487> I had not <WG3361> come <WG2064> and <WG2532> spoken <WG2980> unto them, <WG846> they had not <WG3756> had <WG2192> sin: <WG266> but <WG1161> now <WG3568> they have <WG2192> no <WG3756> cloak <WG4392> for <WG4012> their <WG848> sin. <WG266>
He that hateth <WG3404> me <WG1691> hateth <WG3404> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> also. <WG2532>

If <WG1487> I had not <WG3361> done <WG4160> among <WG1722> them <WG846> the <WG3588> works <WG2041> which <WG3739> none <WG3762> other man <WG243> did, <WG4160> they had not <WG3756> had <WG2192> sin: <WG266> but <WG1161> now <WG3568> have they both <WG2532> seen <WG3708> and <WG2532> hated <WG3404> both <WG2532> me <WG1691> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> Father. <WG3962>

But <WG235> this cometh to pass, that <WG2443> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> might be fulfilled <WG4137> that is written <WG1125> in <WG1722> their <WG846> law, <WG3551> They hated <WG3404> me <WG3165> without a cause. <WG1432>

But <WG1161> when <WG3752> the <WG3588> Comforter <WG3875> is come, <WG2064> whom <WG3739> I <WG1473> will send <WG3992> unto you <WG5213> from <WG3844> the <WG3588> Father, <WG3962> even the <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> of truth, <WG225> which <WG3739> proceedeth <WG1607> from <WG3844> the <WG3588> Father, <WG3962> he <WG1565> shall testify <WG3140> of <WG4012> me: <WG1700>
